name: Hpi_alias_type
title: HPI Alias Type
description: A coded type for an alias name.

concept.definition: The name by which the organisation or facility is also known as.
The previous legal name(s) of the organisation/facility.
The Māori name of the organisation or facility.
The name as recorded in the official register eg Register of Companies.
An abbreviated name by which the organisation or facility is known.
Used when the organisation/facility has a separate trading name.
The name currently used for a facility.

purpose: A coded type for an alias name.
